snippet: A Police Academy instructor was restricted to administrative duties following testimony about education lapses detailed in Officer Peter Liang’s manslaughter trial.
abstract: Melissa Brown, instructor at New York City Police Academy, is stripped of badge and gun for providing insufficient CPR training to class of recruits including Peter Liang, officer convicted in fatal shooting of Akai Gurley in Brooklyn housing project; Liang, in addition to manslaughter, was found guilty of failing to help wounded Gurley.
lead_paragraph: A Police Academy instructor was restricted to administrative duties following testimony about education lapses detailed in Officer Peter Liang’s manslaughter trial.
